page.title: 11RELIGION
page.content:
{St. Alkmunds}church was built in 1712. It was built with white stone, so that is how Whitchurch got its name.It cost Â£4,000 pounds to build it.In the archway of the church is the heart of {Sir John Talbot.}There are 8 bells in the bell room. I think church is boring because it has the same service every week and the rector says all the same things.I think it is not for children it is more for grown ups.My mum takes me to church because I am going to be confirmed in 1 years time.My Mum,Dad and Caroline have all been confirmed they can go up for bread and wine.
{% of children who go to church in each class at our school. W1 S1 W2 S2 D2 W3 S3 W4 S4 D4 6.6 21.8 16 12 27 20 8.5 29.6 3.5 26.6
